name: @aeon-ai-pay/x402
description: Aeon's x402 open protocol for blockchain-native payments

scripts.build: node ../../../scripts/create-paywall-stub.js && pnpm exec tsc && cd src/paywall-app && pnpm i && pnpm build && cd ../.. && node ../../../scripts/build-paywall.js && pnpm exec tsc
scripts.build:paywall: cd src/paywall-app && pnpm i && pnpm build && node ../../../../../scripts/build-paywall.js
